snippet.title: Follow the meaning - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
We’re beyond excited to reveal we’re publishing HiKing Mind Studio's debut game: 🔎 Follow the meaning! 🎉

Follow the meaning promises an intriguing story wrapped in a unique atmosphere filled with interesting characters, various puzzles and hidden object elements that are bound to satisfy your cravings for something… different!

🕵️ Wishlist Follow the meaning on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2720280/Follow_the_meaning/?beta=0

🔎 And make sure the check out www.followthemeaning.com

🎵 Music by: Victor Butzelaar

Like and follow HiKing Mind Studio:
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hikingmindstudio/
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/HiKing_Mind
📘  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hikingmindstudio

Like and follow Second Maze:
📷 Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/secondmaze/
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/second_maze
♪ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@secondmaze
📘  Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/secondmazestudios
💬 Discord: https://www.discord.gg/tsZ2XuuDPW
📬 And please subscribe to our mailing list: http://eepurl.com/hHIqvn
